__e: The plastics are the originals, and they don't have to pay anyone to be their friend.
Listen, Anna, I know the rules state that you're supposed to hate Dad's new girlfriend, but I'm really hoping that we can be more original than that and make this work.
Find the originals and I can get to work.
Well, uh... I was wondering if you had the original building plans, so I could continue looking around.

We don't know how long it's going to be until she's well enough to talk, so I was hoping, in the meantime, maybe you might like to review original case files and see if there was a link between the two girls.
In the original case files, my father circled the feet of all the victims, like they had something in common.
Just like the day my dad brought it home. There's a homeless encampment on the beach not far from here.
Did you run the original of this letter for prints and DNA?
